title: Bakuretsu Hunters (Dub)
alternative_title: Sorcerer Hunters, Spell Wars: Sorcerer Hunters Revenge, 爆れつハンター
description: In the continent of spooner, sorcerers, who are the continent's aristocrats, have begun to abuse their powers. Under the guidance of Big Momma (their boss) Carrot (who turns into a giant monster every time he's placed under a magic spell), Gateau (a bodybuilder), Marron (a mage), Chocolate and Tira (who can transform into dominatrix's at will) must stop the evil sorcerers from picking on the weak; however, none of them (except maybe Marron) have a clue to what's going on.
genre: [<Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Ecchi>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Magic>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Supernatural>]
